title.narrative: Enhancement of the role of the INGO Forum in the D R Congo

description.narrative: By solidifying the coordination structure, the project will 1) provide the INGO coordination with necessary dedicated resources to support and sustain its proper functioning and ensure follow up on critical issues, such as administrative obstacles; 2) provide external stakeholders with a single point of contact for enquiries on INGO activities and visions/strategy on specific issues of common interest; 3) strengthen linkage and collaboration between INGO coordination platforms at national and provincial level; and 4) ensure improved INGO participation at key humanitarian coordination forums. The platform will serve as the national coordinating body for the INGO community.

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY

recipient-country.narrative: Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The
